Source code for leukapp.apps.individuals.admin

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

# django
from django.contrib import admin

# leukapp
from leukapp.apps.specimens.models import Specimen

# local
from .models import Individual



[docs]class SpecimenInline(admin.StackedInline):
    model = Specimen
    extra = 2




[docs]class IndividualAdmin(admin.ModelAdmin):
    inlines = [SpecimenInline]


admin.site.register(Individual, IndividualAdmin)
